content: Show your love of Nutella while staying fashionable at all times with the Nutella ring. This cute accessory contains a miniature and realistically portrayed Nutella bottle resting on an elegant steel band ideal for sweetening up any outfit.

Bring sexy back to the Mushroom Kingdom with this head turning Super Mario latex outfit. This skintight latex outfit consists of high waisted capri leggings and a crop top designed to mimic our favorite Yoshi-riding, mushroom-eating, princess-saving Italian plumber.

Keep track of every single inch you burn off while on your diet with the measuring tape belt. This helpful belt displays measurements in both inches and centimeters so you can easily keep track of your progress no matter what system of measurement you abide by.

Transform your trusty steed into a magical creature with the unicorn horn horse attachment. This imaginative attachment goes on the top brow of the horse and fits comfortably as you ride your – silver or golden horned – unicorn.

It’s dangerous to go alone – take this blankie! Featuring the nostalgic quote from the wise old bearded man from the original NES Legend of Zelda video game – this clever acrylic throw blanket is perfect for the young princess saver in your family.

Unlock the true power of the Triforce while you get absolutely hammered with the Legend Of Zelda bottle opener. Built out of premium ten gauge steel, the sturdy Zelda themed bottle opener’s sword also functions as a means of puncturing and shotgunning beers.

Your baby may be too young to save princesses and conquer water temples – but he’s never too young to  be dressed in legendary style. With the Zelda inspired Link onesie you can dress your little hero and make him a hit at the playgrounds.

Jewelry with fluffy hearts and cute pendants won’t save your ass when all hell breaks loose, but the zombie apocalypse tools bracelet might. It includes all the reminder charms you’ll need for survival from canned food for nourishment. a compass, and ax to help your survive.

Add a touch of magic to your plain muggle bathroom with the Ministry of Magic toilet decal. Now Harry Potter fans will be able to send their <del>waste</del> unwanted guests to the magical realm of wizards and witches instead of those rat infested city sewers.

In Zelda: Ocarina of Time, one of the best Nintendo games ever, the Zelda Kokiri Forest Emerald is the stone that guides Link from the Deku tree. Guide yourself with this Kokiri Forest Emerald necklace, designed to make you look, feel, and think just like Link.

Complete your killer dinosaur costume by adding the perfect finishing touch with the triceratops copper mask. Crafted by hand, this intricately designed mask works as both a fashion accessory or as an abstract piece of dino art for the home.

Increase your offspring’s cuteness factor tenfold when you dress them up with the Cabbage Patch Kids wig. Available as a sewing pattern or as a finished hat, these cute wigs come in a variety of colors so your kids can look like a cuddly doll no matter what the occasion.

As long as you have the children’s books necklace your favorite literary works will always remain close to your heart. Each pendant is designed to resemble a classic book and houses two pictures on the inside – the ideal gift for any avid reader.

What better way to combine your love of paleontology and botany than with the dinosaur planters. These vibrant planters are available in several species of dinosaurs so you can choose your favorite one or give the perfect gift to the dino lover with a green thumb.

Make your feet look like the most delicious of all foods with sandwich sandals, the flip flops that look like loaded up sammies. Although these shoes don’t feel as squishy as really wearing sandwiches on your feet, you’ll find them far more stylish.

Stay warm like a true hero with the Legend of Zelda Link hoodie. This geeky article of clothing comes equipped with its own Hylian Shield and Master Sword sewn into the hoodie just in case you plan on attacking leaves of grass and pots full of rupees.

Add a fun factor to bath time by showering with the tetris soap. These handmade soaps come available in different fragrances and features seven distinct tetris pieces that actually fit together so you can play a quick game while you shower and ponder life’s great mysteries.

Real friends are like pizza, they come in all toppings and are always welcome. The pizza slice necklace allows you and your closest eight home slices to partake in the sacred bond of friendship by each holding on to their very own golden slice of pie – also available in veggie.

The pentagram bikini will give you some hot satanic tan lines guaranteed to drive all the goth boys crazy. This two piece custom string bikini  features a sinister jet black pentagram displayed over the front that’ll turn heads at any beach, pool, or lake of fire.

Build the ultimate line of defense against waves of zombies by sewing some of these Plants Vs. Zombies plushies. Each pattern pack includes instructions to construct sunflowers, wall-nuts, and pea shooter plants so you can conquer those darn whippersnapper zombies.

It’s doesn’t get much geekier and naughtier than the latex Batman underwear. These sexy and nerdy panties display Batman’s logo across the rear-end against a white backdrop of white to make it stand out as it accentuates the body’s natural curves.

Don’t worry if your career plans don’t work out because with the Goonies Doubloon replica in your hands, One Eyed Willie’s treasure is yours for the taking. This replica contains all the same markings necessary to lead you and a rag tag group of friends to great riches.

No matter what Pokemon pipe you choose, the adventures you’ll embark on with your new companion are guaranteed to give you a magical experience. Once they learn moves like the THC tackle and Mary Jane sweep your pipe will become unstoppable.

Save the princess from danger and then save yourself from disgusting body odor with these Legend of Zelda themed rupee soap bars. Each set comes with four differently colored rupee soap bars, so you can bathe yourself in various Hyrule denominations.

This baby cowboy hat crochet pattern creates a beautiful cowboy hat for your little cowpoke or cowgirl. All those baby beanies shaped like owls are kinda cute, but this hat lends your kid an air of mystery and icy cold determination. Just get to stitchin’!

No matter how friendless or unpopular you are, wearing the Daft Punk costume for a night on the town will get you access into any club or party, no questions asked. Once you don Thomas Bangalter’s famous costume, velvet ropes will part and panties will drop.

Take advantage of your second amendment right, even while you shower by bringing the gun soap into the tub or shower. The soap bars combine the essence of America with the most intoxicating aromas around – guaranteed to leave any gun enthusiast spring time clean.

titleEN: School Of Hard Knocks Class Ring
content: Graduating from a prestigious Ivy League institution will pale in comparison to being an ex-alum of the School of Hard Knocks. Just one glance of this distinguished and noble class ring is enough to make future employers hire you on the spot.

Control the lighting in your home using spells and wizardry with this Harry Potter light switch sticker. The sticker is easy to apply and displays the “Lumos” and “Nox” spells over the switch – the ideal way to add a touch of magic to your dull muggle home.

You’ll definitely be “thinking different” when you decide to house your pet in one of the recycled iMac pet beds. The beds are made using hollowed out iMacs that have been re-purposed as snug and comfy homes great for small cats and dogs.

Comb your hair or trendy mustache in the most fashionable way possible with a few strokes with the whale shaped comb. This hand made gem is available in various colors and features a playful design that’ll catch the attention of anyone around.

titleEN: My Side Your Side Pillow Cases
content: Relationships are all about setting boundaries, and to help you set them in the bedroom, here are the ‘my side’ ‘your side’ pillow cases. Each case comes in fashionable white linen and features helpful labels that help you take over 3/4 of the bed to yourself – equality.

Add a peculiar touch to any room with the hanging jellyfish plant. With an overhead dome base and long thin vines, the airplant masquerades as a jellyfish that gracefully floats about the room like a candy wrapper caught in an updraft.

Transform your puny human face into something more respectable – like the face of the great Cthulhu – with this full face leather Cthulhu mask. It’s the perfect accessory for reigning over the planet Earth in a dark period of around over 3000 years.

Add an ultra geeky and stylish component to your PC or laptop with the GameBoy external hard drive. Each drive is made from a retired and hollowed out GameBoy that houses a reliable 500GB-1TB hard drive. For greater convenience, it’s powered soley by a USB cable.

titleEN: Center Of The Universe Cat Hat
content: Give your “center of the universe” cat a fitting crown with this solar system cat hat. This cleverly designed handmade hat has all of the planets orbiting around your cat, proving without a doubt that your charming feline is the absolute center of the universe.

The nixie tube clock will bring a unique touch to any room with its eye-catching design. The custom made clock is composed of six independent nixie tubes that display the time and date through a dazzling display of neon lights.

With Los Pollos Hermanos meth buckets at your disposal, your up and coming meth business will discretely prosper. They provide the perfect front for transporting illicit materials and come with delicious candy inside — you’ll be Kingpin of the local drug market in no time at all.

You ever have the feeling someone is watching you? Well, if you’re eating a dinosaur eye lollipop then you’d be right. Each freakishly delicious lollipop is flavored like cotton candy and comes with a unique eye design that peers into your soul with every lick.

Take jolly old England’s character building gloomy weather wherever you go with the rain cloud necklace. The necklace features a cute cloud pendant made from wool that includes three blue crystal beads to symbolize the raindrops.

Carry your rupees, bombs, arrows, and other hero-like items around with this Zelda Hylian shield backpack. It’s a must have functional piece of gear for the Zelda fan – and no <del>virgin</del> Master Sword wielding princess rescuer should be without one.

Prepare to have others look at you with pure envy when you show up with the LEGO brick bag on your shoulders. Its nostalgic design pays homage to the classic LEGO block while its boxy shape provides ample room for all your belongings.

Introducing the latest design straight off the Aperture Laboratories production line, these highly experimental and wildly unstable Portal earrings are a must have for gamers. You also get your choice of sterling silver or gold for these geeky stud earrings.

Look like one of the most iconic and exotic Disney princesses of all time with the Little Mermaid costume. This handcrafted masterpiece displays such a high level of artistry you’ll swear the seashells were taken directly from the kingdom of Atlantica.

The crayon fake gauge earrings allow you to look wild and rebellious without having to make and permanent body modifications. Upon screwing the two halves in together, they create the appearance the earlobe’s been skewered by a crayon.

No man cave would be complete without the vintage beer can lamp. The frame features a mint condition tall boy 16 oz Budweiser can sitting on a wooden base and complimented by a hand-made pull tab lamp shade that creates a one of a kind lighting pattern.

Fight off armies of deadites with the chainsaw dress. This lovely and graphic dress is emblazoned with a bloody chainsaw draped over the front that creates the illusion you’re wielding it on the stomp of your hand once your hand enters the pocket.

Lawn gnomes just became obsolete. Protect your home from solicitors and burglars with this life size Transformers Bumblebee statue. Standing over seven and half feet tall, this Transformers statue will easily become your favorite home decoration.

For science! No matter how impressive you think your art collection is, it’ll never be “Carl Sagan riding a dinosaur while wielding a lightsaber” impressive, unless you purchase the painting. It also makes a great centerpiece in any internet based circlejerk.

The Pi bottle opener proves that math is actually useful in your day to day life. Even if you’re not able to recite pi to the second decimal point, this geeky bottle opener allows you to appreciate mathematics just like if you were one of the smart kids.

The monster coffee mug is ideal for expressing how you feel every morning you wake up too early to go to school or work. This custom made mug contains a monstrous growling mouth that warns others to keep away until after you’ve had your morning cup of coffee.

Make your earlobes into octopus tentacles with rainbow tentacle faux earplugs. If you don’t want to commit to widening your earring holes and stretching your lobes, these rainbow plugs will fool even the cleverest eye — and they have enough fab to brighten your day.

Walk into the the Halloween ball as the best dressed zombie when you wear the undead tights. These gruesome tights will turn the healthiest looking pair of legs into pale, rotting stumps a decaying zombie such as yourself would be proud to show off.

No matter what the occasion, the Pikachu necklace is the piece of jewelry you’ll choose. The elegant necklace displays a custom cut nickel silver Pikachu pendant guaranteed to make your outfit pop. It’s the ideal statement for the fashion forward Pokemon geek.

Finalize your divorce by severing off your ring finger with this guillotine ring. This morbid jewelry piece makes an excellent gift for a recent divorcees, and lets potential cougars and manthers know that you are single and ready to mingle.

Get cuddly with your favorite Minecraft villain with this life-size creeper pillow. This massive 60″ pillow makes an excellent gift for Minecraft fans, and can even be requested in non-traditional creeper colors such as orange, red, blue, and pink.

Prepare your children for battle against the Imperial army with this Star Wars themed Ewok hat. These geeky yet fearsome furball hats will give your offspring the courage they need to bash a stormtrooper’s head in while looking absolutely adorable.

Your little blockhead will have nothing to say ‘good grief’ about when you dress him up in the Charlie Brown onesie. It displays the iconic black zig-zag line against an all yellow background in a comfortable and easy to to remove garment perfect for any infant.

Gotta cup ’em all! With the Pokemon themed pokebra your twins can be converted into overflowing pokeballs that every nerd will be dying to unleash! These Pokemon bras are custom made so geeks of any shape and size can have their goodies properly supported.

Winter is coming – in LEGO form!  These custom made LEGO figurines feature all your favorite still living – for now – characters from the Game Of Thrones series. These are limited edition LEGOs, and are a must have collectible for Game Of Thrones fans.

Toss out that old Victoria’s Secret lingerie and spoil that special geek in your life by surprising him/her with this sexy TRON corset. This lovely outfit will glow if exposed to bright light – such as UV light – making you look like a sexy character out of the TRON franchise.

Bathe your dark passenger in Dexter Morgan like fashion with this “Slice of Life” decal for your bathtub. It’s the perfect bathroom decor if you love the show Dexter but don’t own a boat – best of all they can be removed without sticky <del>forensic evidence</del> residue being left behind.

Bring new life to your gaming room when you install this Super Metroid stained glass. No detail was spared in creating this masterful stained glass modeled after the iconic Samus Aran in her orange Varia suit – making it an instant collectible for Metroid fans.

You won’t believe how adorable your hands will look with the sloth rings adorning your fingers. Each adjustable ring is made with a silver finish and contain a lethargic sloth so cheerful and cute he’ll brighten up your day every time you look at your hand.

Who knew the Dark Side of the Force was so kinky? With the Star Wars themed lightsaber spank toy you can fulfill all of your geeky BSDM fantasies while simultaneously destroying all of your wonderfully innocent childhood memories of the Star Wars movies.

No shrine to Star Wars would be complete without the Stormtrooper stained glass adorning a window or wall. The masterfully crafted piece depicts the <del>deadly marksman</del> Stormtrooper with blaster in hand as he get ready to fire <del>aimlessly</del> at his desired target.

Keep the last Metroid in captivity by chaining it around your neck with this beautiful Super Metroid necklace. Available in brass, sterling silver, or twenty four carat gold, these gem studded Metroid necklaces make an excellent gift idea for an intergalactic bounty hounter.

Use the bearded Rastafarian hat to unleash your inner <del>stoner</del> rasta without permanently trading in the more conservative look your office job demands of you. This knit beard and dread combo not only alters your appearance but also keeps you warm in cold weather.

We pity the fool that don’t use the Mr. T teapot for afternoon tea and crumpets because this unique teapot is the complete package. Apart from enjoying the sight of Mr. T’s epic mohawk, the teapot’s design allows you to stack the pot on top of the mug for easy storage.

Increase your food supply while upgrading your crafting skills when you spawn the Zerg Overlord plush sewing pattern. This cloaked unit detecting plushie can be crafted by virtually anyone with a sewing machine and is great for scouting the neighborhood for cheesers.

Stop, pause, move left, and move right with the Playstation button earrings. These earrings honor the magnificent Playstation, the game console that brought game graphics into the twentieth century. When you wear them, you can imagine yourself as a console.

There are too many sexy kitties and sexy witches at costume parties. Keep the spirit of dressing up in horrific – but still sexy – manner with these ripped flesh garters. You’ll look like you’ve hooked up your lingerie to your decaying flesh – hot!

You’ll never have to say goodbye to your favorite gaming console thanks to the N64 controller desk organizer. This re-purposed controller is hollowed out so every pen and pencil you have scattered on your desk can remain organized and always at hand.

Spoil your little princess and make her wishes come true with the life size My Little Pony. This enormous and cuddly pony sports a soft and colorful coat of fur complimented by a luxurious brightly colored mane and tail your little girl will go crazy over.

Upgrade your fashion sense to legendary fiction levels with this organic cotton Little Red Riding Hood cloak. This cloak is as soft and comfortable as it is tempting for wild predators, and it may incite gentleman callers to eat your relatives, so beware!

titleEN: Super Mario Match Game Wall Prints
content: Try out your luck with these Super Mario match game wall prints. Inspired from the mini-game featured in Super Mario 3, these highly portable and extremely nostalgic wall prints can be arranged to show a winning spin or an artistically disastrous fold.

Stand your ground during the upcoming Alien invasion with this replica P-5000 power loader. Perfect for picking up and moving around heavy objects – or fighting an invading race of Xenomorphs – the P-5000 replica exoskeleton is a must have collectible.

Honor the man that brought you into this world on Father’s Day with this clever Darth Vader card that reminds us all that there are many worse father figures out there. This humorous Father’s Day card is the perfect gift for a geeky and/or neglectful Dad.

When playing a slow melody opt for the snail-shaped ukulele. This handcrafted ukulele will sound quaint and lovely when strummed, and its snail-shape and detailing will add extra, super cuteness. The ukulele is made of hard maple and hand painted.

Sushi and cake don’t usually go too well together, but these sushi cake pops are a true example defying the odds. With these cake pops, you get a tasty sugary sweet in the form of a perfect rice ball topped with nori, salmon, tuna, or wasabi.

It may not be a narwhal launching a baconator into the sun, but the Reddit upvote/downvote earrings are still a great way to show off your geeky internet ties. True to Reddit, these dangly laser cut acrylic earrings feature both the blue downvote and orange upvote.

Now you can enjoy everyone’s least favorite Halloween candy all year round without actually having to eat it — just wear this cute candy corn hat. This crocheted hat follows the color scheme perfectly with yellow, orange, and white – without the disgusting flavor!

You can keep the weird little house on the hill in your office with the lovingly crafted Beetlejuice terrarium. The iconic haunted house from the most excellent Tim Burton movie stands one and a half inches tall, and it sits atop hills of living, sustainably harvested moss.

You may not be of noble birth, but that doesn’t mean you can’t sit on your own throne. With the Game Of Thrones inspired toilet decal, you can turn your boring porcelain shit receptacle into a glorious iron throne that will strike fear into the heart of your enemies.

titleEN: Han Solo Frozen Light Switch Cover
content: Complete your Star Wars themed room with this Han Solo frozen in carbonite light switch cover. Though his body may be frozen, his ‘lightsaber’ remains functional and acts as the on and off switch – which only adds to Han Solo’s undeniable sex appeal.

Venus flytraps may be cool but they have nothing on the Super Mario piranha plant. This rare beauty of the plant world is made from custom beads to recreate the classic 8-bit look and come in various poses and sizes ideal for decorating any game room.

HEY! LISTEN! Whether you need to freeze an enemy or light a torch halfway across the room, these Legend of Zelda inspired elemental arrow keychains will be sure to do the trick. Available in either light, fire, or ice arrow style, they make for the ultimate in geeky jewelry.

As the cat paper lampshade demonstrates, there’s no such thing as going overboard with cat themed decorations for the home. This kitty inspired custom lampshade features a minimalist design that seems to transform entirely once the lights come on.

If those mounted deer heads are a bit gaudy for your taste, switch over to the deer antler switchplate. The switchplates allow any hunting enthusiast to tastefully decorate their home while also providing a handy spot to hang keys and other knick-knacks.

Who needs guard dogs or fancy security systems when you have the giant metal dragon magnificently towering over your humble abode. This imposing dragon is custom made entirely from metal and stands at over 10 feet tall so all who visit can awe in amazement.

Secure your home with the crème de la crème of 90s technology with the GoldenEye 007 remote mine. You’ll be arming your home with nostalgic weapons – equipped with working LEDs – faster than you can detonate them on your enemies.

You don’t need to be a skilled ocarina player, or have any musical talent for that matter, in order to enjoy the Legend of Zelda songring. Cast in stainless steel, the ring displays the music to the most memorable tunes from the Ocarina of Time.

Complete your Boba Fett costume with this hand made Boba Fett helmet. Crafted using liquid resin and featuring extreme attention to detail, the iconic Mandalorian helmet worn by the infamous bounty hunter can now be yours!

Live out your childhood dream of being a mighty robot when you put on the Ninja Turtles Krang apron. The apron comes with a design that turns the entire torso into Krang’s colossal robotic exoskeleton – complete with the pinkish, brain-like Krang housed in the middle.

Wallets are for chumps, if you really want to tote around your fat stack of dough like a true shot-caller you need the AK-47 money clip. This bad-ass gold plated clip securely hugs your dough while its menacing AK-47 frame warns others to keep their distance.

Now with the Zelda apron you’ll be able to remain at the forefront of Hyrulian fashion even when you’re stuck at home <del>smashing pots</del> doing chores. Each apron is made entirely from cotton for the most comfortable fit possible and comes in either a Zelda or Toon Link design.

Ditch those conventional designer scarves and opt to show off your more industrial side when you begin sporting the knitted power cord. These quirky garments are entirely hand-made and are available in the classic safety orange color in addition to many others.

You don’t have to be part of House Targaryen to get your hands on some rare and valuable dragon eggs. These custom-made eggs make excellent centerpieces and are available in the color styles shown on the TV series or from the book.

Who needs Victoria Secret when you happen to have the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles bra in your collection of intimates? These unique bras are hand painted with extreme detail to mimic the face of your favorite pizza-eating, crime-fighting, sewer-surfing turtles.

Take home a piece of vampire hunting history when you acquire the steampunk bow. This bow is fashioned from sturdy plastic and metal and designed to deliver a deadly stake through the chest of any undead monster; a must have for anyone planning a trip to Transylvania.
